meanings.definition: Combine or unite to form a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The two rivers merged into one large stream.
meanings.sent2: She merged the ingredients to create a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: The colors merged together like a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent4: Their voices merged in perfect harmony during the choir performance.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces finally merged to reveal the complete picture.
